text: Aap khayal kertay hain kay woh beydaar hain halankay woh soye huye thay khud hum hi unhen dayen bayen kerwaten dilaya kertay thay unn ka kutta bhi chokhat per apney hath paon phelaye huye tha. Agar aap jhank ker unhen dekhna chahatay to zaroor ultay paon bhag kharay hotay aur unn kay rob say aap per dehshat chah jati
